title: AI Enthusiast
professionalSummary: Passionate developer with 3+ years of experience building scalable web applications. Specialized in Python, TypeScript, and modern AI-driven development tools. Committed to creating user-centric solutions that bridge technology and human experience.

achievements: Led development of a React-based dashboard serving 10,000+ daily users
Improved application performance by 40% through code optimization
Mentored 5 junior developers and established coding standards
Integrated AI-powered features that increased user engagement by 25%
Collaborated with design team to implement responsive UI components
Successfully delivered 15+ projects on time and within budget
Developed 20+ responsive web applications using React and Vue.js
Reduced page load times by 35% through performance optimization
Implemented automated testing suites with 90% code coverage
Worked closely with UX designers to improve user experience metrics
Maintained legacy codebases and migrated to modern frameworks

projects.name: Infraon - AIOps
projects.description: As a Senior Backend Developer in the Enterprise Solutions team, I led the development of AI-powered dashboards and forecasting tools for IT operations management. The platform integrated predictive analytics and time-series modeling to provide early warning systems, performance forecasts, and actionable insights. I was responsible for implementing key components using scalable data pipelines, integrating machine learning models (e.g., XGBoost, Facebook Prophet), and optimizing backend architecture for real-time operations.
projects.outcomes: Delivered intelligent observability tools adopted by major Indian enterprises, resulting in a 35% improvement in operational incident response times

projects.name: Infraon - IPAM (IP Address Management)
projects.description: Served as a Senior Developer within the Enterprise Solutions team, overseeing the architecture and development of a robust IP address management (IPAM) system. I designed hierarchical models to manage IP allocations, subnets, and VLANs efficiently across enterprise networks. The platform ensures secure, auditable IP tracking and integrates seamlessly with network monitoring tools.
projects.outcomes: Deployed across organizations like ISRO, enabling structured IP governance and reducing configuration errors by 25%

projects.name: Infraon - Network Management Systems (NMS)
projects.description: As a Senior Backend Developer in the Enterprise Solutions team, I contributed to the design and delivery of customized network management systems for high-profile clients. I led development and guided two team members in building solutions for network monitoring, alert management, and real-time performance tracking. Our work supported complex client environments by delivering highly available, event-driven systems.
projects.outcomes: Enabled real-time network monitoring for Indian enterprise clients, improving uptime and reducing troubleshooting time by up to 30%

projects.name: Adaptive Learning Solutions - Educational Platform
projects.description: Worked as a Junior Python Developer responsible for backend feature development and API integration for an adaptive learning platform. Supported core development efforts and implemented automation scripts to improve content delivery and system performance.
projects.outcomes: Contributed to system enhancements that improved learning module efficiency and increased student engagement by 15%
